strings.M500: [Language] - metadata language is not defined while other languages are declared, or metadata language is also defined in the list of the other languages.

alert.M500.div:
Verify that the metadata language is defined if other languages are defined (gmd:locale in dvanced view / metadata section).
Suggestion: Define metadata language or delete the other languages (gmd:locale)

alert.M501.div:
The main metadata language may be defined only once.
Suggestion: remove the head metadata language from the list of other languages
